            <div class="banner-message"><div class="message-wrapper" id="banner_general_message_1">
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12">
            <h2 class="message-header A-TYP22L-RW-ALL">Beware of Phishing SMS</h2>
            <button class="close-message-button" data-message-id="29c471c83c">
                <span class="icon icon-delete" aria-hidden="true"></span>
                <span class="visuallyhidden"></span>
            </button>
        </div>
        <div class="sm-12 lg-8">
            <div class="message-text A-TYP16R-RW-ALL"><p>HSBC will never ask customers to contact third-party insurance companies via SMS links or phone numbers. All our one-way SMS bears IDs starting with '#' only. Stay vigilant! <a href="/help/cybersecurity-and-fraud/phishing/">Learn more</a>.</p>
</div>

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_14" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"></p><p>To open an HSBC MPF personal account, complete a <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/in81.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><span aria-hidden="true">HSBC Mandatory Provident Fund – SuperTrust Personal Account application form (PDF)</span><span class="visuallyhidden">HSBC Mandatory Provident Fund – SuperTrust Personal Account application form (PDF)  This link will open in a new window</span></a>.</p>
<p>If you would to consolidate your benefits into the new MPF Personal Account, please complete these forms as well:</p>
<div class="commonMark-list">
<ul role="list">
<li><a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/inpm.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><span aria-hidden="true">Scheme member's request for fund transfer INPM form (PDF)</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Scheme member's request for fund transfer INPM form (PDF)  This link will open in a new window</span></a></li>
<li><a href="https://www.mpfa.org.hk/en/utinity-bar/useful-tools/forms/mpf-schemes/consolidation-of-personal-accounts" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><span aria-hidden="true">Scheme member's request for account consolidation form</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Scheme member's request for account consolidation form  This link will open in a new window</span></a> from the MPFA website</li>
</ul>
</div>
<p> <br></p>
<p>You can drop off the completed forms at any HSBC branch or mail them to us at:
 <br></p>
<p>HSBC Provident Fund Trustee (Hong Kong) Limited <br>
c/o The Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corporation Limited<br>
PO Box 73770 Kowloon Central Post Office</p>
<p></p>
</div></div>

            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1466076584__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_16" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"></p><p>It will depend on how you submit your application to us.</p>
<div class="commonMark-list">
<ul role="list">
<li>By HSBC HK Mobile Banking app: within 5 business days</li>
<li>By paper form: within 5 business days</li>
<li>By tablet through an MPF specialist at a designated HSBC branch: within 1 business day</li>
</ul>
</div>
<p>Learn more about <a href="https://www.hsbc.com.hk/mpf/processing-time/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><span aria-hidden="true">our processing time for account enrolment</span><span class="visuallyhidden">our processing time for account enrolment  This link will open in a new window</span></a>.</p>

    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1302089688__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-1302089688__tab0" class="dropdown-text">When will I receive my bonus unit rebates? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1302089688__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="pp_main_columnControl_21">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="pp_main_columnControlColumn_34" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_17" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"></p><p>We'll credit the bonus units to your account within 2 months after the 6-months transfer-in holding period. For example:</p>
<p>You submit your 'Scheme member's request for fund transfer form' on 4 January 2022, and you successfully transfer HKD90,000 in accrued benefits on 4 February 2022. After 3 August 2022, we'll credit the HKD200 in bonus units to your personal account within 2 months.</p>
<p>After your first transfer, you submit an 'Employee Choice Arrangement – transfer election form' on 1 April 2022 and you successfully transfer HKD18,000 in accrued benefits on 3 May 2022. The cumulative amount you've transferred in is HKD108,000, so you've reached tier 2. After 2 November 2022, we'll credit the HKD300 bonus units to your personal account within 2 months. So the total bonus units that will be credited to you is HKD500.</p>
<p>Terms and conditions apply. For more details please see the <a href="https://www.hsbc.com.hk/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/bonus_unit_offer.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><span aria-hidden="true">offer leaflet (PDF)</span><span class="visuallyhidden">offer leaflet (PDF)  This link will open in a new window</span></a>.</p>
<p></p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>

    </div>

</div>

<div id="pp_main_columnControl_22">

        <div id="pp_main_columnControlColumn_35" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_18" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"></p><p>You can submit your instructions to rebalance or switch funds online, via the mobile app or the Interactive Voice Response System (IRVS).</p>
<p>If you submit them before 4:00pm on a working day, we'll process them within the same day. Otherwise, we'll process them on the next business day.</p>
<p>See <a href="https://www.hsbc.com.hk/mpf/processing-time/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><span aria-hidden="true">how to submit instructions and their processing time.</span><span class="visuallyhidden">how to submit instructions and their processing time.  This link will open in a new window</span></a></p>
<p></p>

<div id="pp_main_columnControl_23">

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_19" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"></p><p>You can check your account balances:</p>
<div class="commonMark-list">
<ul role="list">
<li>in HSBC Online Banking or on the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app</li>
<li>by calling our HSBC MPF member hotline on <a href="tel:+852-3128-0128" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="no-link" role="presentation"><span aria-hidden="true">(852) 3128 0128</span><span class="visuallyhidden">(852) 3128 0128  This link will open in a new window</span></a>—for details on service options, please refer to the 'HSBC MPF member hotline' section in the <a href="https://www.hsbc.com.hk/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/member-service-guide.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><span aria-hidden="true">member service guide</span><span class="visuallyhidden">member service guide  This link will open in a new window</span></a></li>
<li>at any HSBC or Hang Seng Bank ATM</li>
<li>by checking your consolidated bank statement—available to HSBC Global Private Banking, HSBC Premier Elite, HSBC Premier, HSBC One and Personal Integrated customers, subject to circumstances; for details, please refer to the 'Mail statements' section in the <a href="https://www.hsbc.com.hk/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/member-service-guide.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><span aria-hidden="true">member service guide</span><span class="visuallyhidden">member service guide  This link will open in a new window</span></a></li>

    <div id="pp_main_advanced_expander_10" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="faq-5"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1151830165__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="1151830165__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How many fund switches can I make per year? Are there any handling charges? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1151830165__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="pp_main_columnControl_24">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="pp_main_columnControlColumn_37" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_20" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"></p><p>You can make an unlimited number of fund switches per year, without any handling charges.</p>
<p>However, we would remind you that the objective of MPF is to save for retirement, So your investment objectives should be for the longer term and you should take your personal circumstances into consideration.</p>
<p></p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="pp_main_advanced_expander_11" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="faq-6"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="763688674__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="763688674__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Can I change the investment allocations in my MPF account? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="763688674__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="pp_main_columnControl_25">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="pp_main_columnControlColumn_38" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_21" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"></p><p>Yes, you can change your investment allocations through any of these four ways.</p>
<p><strong>Portfolio rebalance</strong></p>
<p>You can change the investment allocation of your existing investments and new contributions, including but not limited to the accrued benefits transferred from another registered scheme. The necessary units will be redeemed to rebalance existing investments in your portfolio.</p>
<p><strong>Asset switch</strong></p>
<p>You can choose to switch all or some of the units from one or more constituent funds. Then, you can reallocate the redeemed amounts to another constituent fund or across a number of constituent funds.</p>
<p>The investment allocation of your new contributions, including but not limited to the accrued benefits transferred from another registered scheme, will remain unchanged.</p>
<p><strong>Contribution redirection</strong></p>
<p>You can opt to change the investment allocation of your new contributions, including but not limited to the accrued benefits transferred from another registered scheme. The investment allocation of your existing contributions will remain unchanged.</p>
<p><strong>Leave the Default Investment Strategy (DIS)</strong></p>
<p>All your existing investments, future contributions and accrued benefits as transferred from another registered scheme will be invested according to the investment allocation at the time you left the DIS. They will not be reweighted or automatically de-risked in the future, per the DIS.</p>
<p></p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="pp_main_advanced_expander_12" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="faq-7"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-642856843__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-642856843__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How do I change the investment allocations in my MPF account? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-642856843__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="pp_main_columnControl_26">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="pp_main_columnControlColumn_39" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_22" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"></p><p>You can use the following service channels to rebalance your portfolio, switch your assets, or redirect your contributions:</p>
<div class="commonMark-list">
<ul role="list">
<li>HSBC Online Banking</li>
<li>HSBC HK App</li>
<li>By using our form</li>
</ul>
</div>
<p>Portfolio rebalancing and contribution redirections are also available via our Interactive Voice Response System (IRVS) on the MPF member hotline, which you can call at <a href="tel:+852-3128-0128" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="no-link" role="presentation"><span aria-hidden="true">(852) 3128 0128</span><span class="visuallyhidden">(852) 3128 0128  This link will open in a new window</span></a>.</p>
<p>If you want to stop using the Default Investment Strategy (DIS), please submit your request by form.</p>
<p></p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    

</div>
</div></div>

<div>
    <ul id="pp_main_links_3" class="links-list">

    <h3 aria-label="Important notes" class="A-TYP28L-RW-ALL">Important notes</h3>
    <div class="genericModalBody parsys">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text"><div data-zone="Hongkong" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" id="genericModalBody_richtext_1">
    <ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>The HSBC Mandatory Provident Fund - SuperTrust Plus is a mandatory provident fund scheme.<br> </li> 
 <li>You should consider your own risk tolerance level and financial circumstances before making any investment choices or investing in the MPF Default Investment Strategy (the ‘DIS’). You should note that the DIS Constituent Funds, namely, the Core Accumulation Fund and the Age 65 Plus Fund, the DIS or a certain Constituent Fund may not be suitable for you. There may be a risk mismatch between the DIS Constituent Funds or a certain Constituent Fund and your risk profile (the resulting portfolio risk may be greater than your risk preference). When you are in doubt as to whether the DIS or a certain Constituent Fund is suitable for you (including whether it is consistent with your investment objectives), you should seek financial and/or professional advice. You should make the investment decision most suitable for you taking into account your circumstances.</li> 
 <li>You should note that the implementation of the DIS may have an impact on your MPF investments and accrued benefits. We recommend that you consult with the Trustee if you have doubts on how you are being affected.</li> 
 <li>The Guaranteed Fund invests solely in an approved pooled investment fund (‘APIF’) in the form of an insurance policy provided by HSBC Life (International) Limited. The guarantee is also given by HSBC Life (International) Limited. Your investments in the Guaranteed Fund, if any, are therefore subject to the credit risks of HSBC Life (International) Limited. Please refer to section 4 ‘Risks’ of the <a rel="noopener" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/mpf_scheme_brochure.pdf"><span aria-hidden="true">MPF Scheme Brochure</span><span class="visuallyhidden">MPF Scheme Brochure This link will open in a new window This link will open in a new window</span></a> for details of the credit risk.</li> 
 <li>The guarantee in the Guaranteed Fund only applies under certain conditions. Please refer to subsection 3.4.3(f) ‘Guarantee features’ of the <a rel="noopener" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/mpf_scheme_brochure.pdf"><span aria-hidden="true">MPF Scheme Brochure</span><span class="visuallyhidden">MPF Scheme Brochure This link will open in a new window This link will open in a new window</span></a> for details of the guarantee features (including in the context of payment of accrued benefits in instalments) and the ‘Guarantee Conditions’.<br> </li> 
 <li>MPF Benefits, AVC Benefits and TVC Benefits are payable on a Member’s 65th birthday or on early retirement on or after reaching age 60. The accrued benefits can be paid in one lump sum or in instalments, at the Member’s election.  The accrued benefits can be paid in such form and on such terms and conditions as the Trustee may, to the extent not prohibited by the MPF Ordinance or General Regulation, prescribe. Please refer to subsection 6.7(c) ‘Payment of MPF Benefits, AVC Benefits and TVC Benefits’ of the <a rel="noopener" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/mpf_scheme_brochure.pdf"><span aria-hidden="true">MPF Scheme Brochure</span><span class="visuallyhidden">MPF Scheme Brochure This link will open in a new window This link will open in a new window</span></a> for details.</li> 
 <li>You should not invest based on the information shown on this website alone and should read the <a rel="noopener" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/mpf_scheme_brochure.pdf"><span aria-hidden="true">MPF Scheme Brochure</span><span class="visuallyhidden">MPF Scheme Brochure This link will open in a new window This link will open in a new window</span></a>. <br> </li> 
 <li>Investment involves risks. Past performance is not indicative of future performance. The value of financial instruments, in particular stocks and shares, and any income from such financial instruments, may go down as well as up. For further details including the product features and risks involved, please refer to the <a rel="noopener" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/mpf_scheme_brochure.pdf"><span aria-hidden="true">MPF Scheme Brochure</span><span class="visuallyhidden">MPF Scheme Brochure This link will open in a new window This link will open in a new window</span></a>. <br> </li> 
 <li>Important – if you are in doubt about the meaning or effect of the contents of the <a rel="noopener" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/mpf_scheme_brochure.pdf"><span aria-hidden="true">MPF Scheme Brochure</span><span class="visuallyhidden">MPF Scheme Brochure This link will open in a new window This link will open in a new window</span></a>, you should seek independent professional advice.</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>
